s: March 5, 2019 - In early 2018, Scott Fetzer brought together Halex, Ginsu Brands and Wayne Water Systems to form Scott Fetzer Consumer Brands (SFCB). The core purpose of SFCB is to develop extraordinary products and services to help consumers protect, enjoy and connect their homes.
